title: App crashes if send transaction from chat signed with keycard
body:
### Description
[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
_Type_: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
_Summary_: App crashes if send transaction from chat:


#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
no crash, transaction is sent or error message explaining why it can't be sent

#### Actual behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
crash

### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

* Open Status and sign in with keycard
* open 1:1 chat with a contact
* send 0.0001 ETHro 
* Sign transaction 
* enter valid PIN
* check if transaction is sent or error message is shown

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)

* Status version: 0.12.0 apk http://status-im-prs.ams3.digitaloceanspaces.com/StatusIm-190402-123212-80ef5d-pr.apk
* Operating System: Android 9, Pixel XL

#### Logs
[geth.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/3039469/geth.log)
[Status.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/3039470/Status.log)
I have fix for this one. Waiting for https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7882 to be merged first
